EmailTemplate.description: To be used for quick fixes to generic problems
EmailTemplate.name: ManagerFeedbackClosed_ChangeImplemented
EmailTemplate.subject: Manager Feedback:{!Managers_Feedback__c.Name}:{!Managers_Feedback__c.Subject__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Managers_Feedback__c.CreatedBy},
Thank you for submitting feedback while using the employee portal on {!Managers_Feedback__c.CreatedDate}. This type of thoughtful feedback is extremely helpful and important to us in delivering the highest levels of quality and service to our valuable customers. Based on your comments, we have implemented a change to our {!Managers_Feedback__c.Service_Area__c} process. We look forward to any additional feedback you have on our process at Sutter Shared Services.
Sincerely,
{!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerFullName}
